<wei>.name: Wei
<wei>.info: He exudes quiet strength and sophistication, often portraying serious and intense characters. His minimalist style enhances his charismatic presence.

<cho>.name: Cho
<cho>.info: A rising actress with a bright and cheerful aura, she brings energy to the screen and stage alike. Her youthful confidence and style catch the spotlight with ease.

<park>.name: Park
<park>.info: An elegant actress with a modern and poised style, she brings sophistication to her roles. Her calm gaze and confident stance show her composure and strength.

<wook>.name: Wook
<wook>.info: He gives off a composed and intellectual aura, often seen in professional or office settings. His subtle smile and clean-cut appearance suggest quiet confidence and thoughtfulness.
